== Approval Application for Catalan LoCo Team (ubuntu-cat) ==
 
{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <tablestyle="float:left; width:105px; margin: 0 0 0em 0em; "style="padding:0.5em; "><nowiki>[[File:ubuntucat_deg.png]]</nowiki>
|}

The Ubuntu Catalan LoCo Team is a very active, fast growing group of people that supports and spreads Ubuntu amongst the Catalan speaking community. It is the most important resource of information about Ubuntu in this language. We are a very heterogeneus and varied group of people focused on spreading the free software philosophy, specially Ubuntu, and have several projects in mind that will be done by our different workgroups in the near future.

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CatalanTeam/En|CatalanTeam/En]]</nowiki>

=== Key Details ===

* '''Date''' - ''May 15^th^, 2007''
* '''Team Contact''' - Rafael Carreras <rafael.carreras@gmail.com>
* '''Membership''' - 222 members as of May 15th, 2007
* '''Mailing List''' - https://lists.lafarga.cpl.upc.edu/mailman/listinfo/ubuntucat-info
* '''Official Page:''' http://www.ubuntu.cat/
* '''Forum:''' <nowiki>[[http://cat.ubuntuforums.org/]]</nowiki> (<nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/forumdisplay.php?f=206|direct link]]</nowiki>)
* '''Planet:''' <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu.cat]]</nowiki>
* '''IRC Channel:''' #ubuntu-cat on Freenode, irc.freenode.net

=== Roadmap ===

* Ubuntu <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CatalanTeam/InstallParty|Install Party]]</nowiki> (codename: '24 chosen party') - 20^th^ May, 2007, at the Technical University of Catalonia, Barcelona (UPC).

* <nowiki>[[Jordi67|Jordi Alins]]</nowiki>, LoCo member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CatalanTeam/En/SpreadGroup|Spread Workgroup]]</nowiki>, is attending the UbuCon in Sevilla, 5^th^ May, 2007, with a lecture about the '''Ubuntu diffusion between adult population, from a constructivistic pedagogic perspective'''.

* ''<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CatalanTeam/FestaDeFirmes|2nd key signing party]]</nowiki>'' and Conference - Postponed to June.

* Management actions in order to bring RMS to Caldes de Montbuï, near Barcelona, on 12^th^ or 13^th^ May, 2007.

* Improvements of http://ubuntu.cat in order to get a nice static web page.

* Schedule of courses and speeches in schools and centers.

* Collaboration in the <nowiki>[[http://softwarefreedomday.org/teams/Catalonia|Software Freedom Day in Barcelona]]</nowiki> - 15^th^ September, 2007.
